channel.title: Looking to host a runescape server - abundance of Server hardware
channel.description:
I would like to set up a runescape server that mimics the way the game was from jadex as close as possible. I played around with running a runescape classic server back at my high school for a while, it was fun but I miss the runescape 2 world im used to playing in. Im good with maintaining and running servers, I also ran a world of warcraft server way back and wrote some custom lua scripts for it. Im not sure where to begin with setting up a server, so im posting here. Im looking to perhaps work with someone else to run a server that closely emulates what the official server was like.
Heres the cool part - Ive got a ton of rackmount servers just aching for a purpose. Servers all run linux. They are older, kinda starting to drag when it comes to running world of warcraft and Unreal related stuff, but i think they will be well suited for a runescape server. Lots of redundancy and fault tolerance.I have a fast comcast internet connection, been using it to host a web site and share files. Any suggestions on how to get started or someone with experience wanting to team up, just send a pm or an email. Again, any suggestions are welcome. Specs follow :
IBM netfinity 5600 4 GB of memory raid 5 array dual pentium Xeon
poweredge 6450 raid 5 array with failover disk 2.50 Gb quad pentium 3 xeon
... lots of others, too many to list, similar to above. Actually going to pick up another from a liquidateion sale warehouse tomarrow . . .

item.title: Looking to host a runescape server - abundance of Server hardware
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Jmood:

Good luck with emulating runescape that closely. Many people have tried to start a project such as this but they usually fail.

Always*

Read full topic
